message.content: {"given_definition_quality":62,"better_definition":"road; street (for vehicles)","sentence":"车在马路上。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style illustration showing a simple, wide road (马路) with a single car driving on it. The scene is calm, the grey road stretches to the horizon, blending slightly with the damaged, overgrown edges of a quiet post-apocalyptic city. Sunlight filters through broken city structures. The focus is the clear, empty road and the car as the subject.","sentence_translation":"The car is on the road."}
